channel.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
channel.description:
So i managed to get the axo to play samples from the sdcard but when i add more than 1 sdcard sample reader objects and press live it disconnets... even without any samples looked up....
Anyone who experienced this?! anyone who might have a solution?!

item.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
item.dc:creator: @Kalle challester
item.description:
@Kalle wrote:

WUUUUHUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU streamer object med the difference thx guys now im happy again

Read full topic

item.source: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects

item.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

screenshots don't help, if you send me patch + samples I can try it out.
( I don't have time to start building patches, and converting wav files - sorry)

how big are the samples? have you tried smaller samples?

important... did you test your SD Card, check the SD card performance thread, check you are getting similar to those reported there - could be a bad sd card.

I assume you are always getting the same error, i.e. it disconnects

did you replace the objects? also you probably need to take the streamer.h file as well.
(I don't know for sure as not checked code)

are you finding sometimes it runs, sometimes not... if so Id suspect its the previous issue, you will find out the issues I had , prior to the fix,in the above thread.

from memory I had at least 12 running I last tried this, using the latest build of the software, but it was of the same sample.

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
item.dc:creator: @Kalle challester
item.description:
@Kalle wrote:

i didt that this morning... tried the new objects.... 3 objects and 4 can be there in live but with no sample and not connected to the mixer object... when i connect the nr.4 play fn object to the mixer object and press live the core board restarts... then i can go back to the Main axoloti window connect the board to the editor again go back in the patch disconnet the nr.4 play fn object from the mixer and press live... then it runs... but thats how far it goes... and its wierd...

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects

item.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

Either wait for a new release (with the fix on wave play) or you can download from github here:
https://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/tree/master/objects/wave and replace this object.
navigate to the file, right-click->save link as on the "raw" button.
(i'm on mac so not much help beyond this)

Read full topic

item.source: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects

item.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

this is probably due to the previous reported problems, which @johannes has fixed, but has not been released yet, see https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/load-sample-from-sd-to-waveplayer-crashes/178/32

I think @keyman has already updated his objects from the repo, which is why he is not getting it any more

Kalle, the above post explains how you can get the newer version prior to release.

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti Disconnects when have more than 2 SDcard read objects
item.dc:creator: @Kalle challester
item.description:
@Kalle wrote:

Here is the patch and pictures of the editor and the start screen... got it into live mode... as soon as a put in the first "hit" in the first sequencer line the board disconnected...

I just reinstalled the Editor and "updated" the firmware but nothing helped

Could it be the SDcard?!

Crash Patch.axp (4.0 KB)

Patch.png1680x1050 54.8 KB
Axo.png1680x1050 84.9 KB
